peach.fuzzy¶

This package implements fuzzy logic. Consult:

base
Basic definitions, classes and operations in fuzzy logic;
mf
Membership functions;
defuzzy
Defuzzification methods;
control
Fuzzy controllers (FIS - Fuzzy Inference Systems), for Mamdani- and Sugeno-type controllers and others;
cmeans
Fuzzy C-Means clustering algorithm;

Contents:

  • peach.fuzzy.base
  • peach.fuzzy.cmeans
  • peach.fuzzy.control
  • peach.fuzzy.defuzzy
  • peach.fuzzy.mf
  • peach.fuzzy.norms
